data.text: @Eddie_Charles19 @CineFeline May I add in that I really like this film. I think it gets the fear that many had for nuclear power. I think Cher is really great- very unglamorous. I also really like the Jane Fonda film China Syndrome. Her hair is flaming red on the film!

@CineFeline Ooh, I will definitely have to watch it now. I am really sad that she didn't get to live longer and make more films! I also need to check out Heartburn. I saw a beautiful edition of the book in Waterstones the other day.

@CineFeline I got this tweet notification out of context and thought you meant in real life! Let me know how Silkwood is, it’s been on watchlist for ages. Nora, Meryl, AND Cher?! Definitely sounds like my kind of film
